name: Eggocalypse
description:
Hello there, stranger and welcome to these distant lands full of dangers !

Seems, like you found your way through the maze filled with videogames and found my little, new game "Eggocalypse".

Just a few moments before, it broke out of it's shell, so that you - yes, i am talking to YOU in front of the monitor -  can help Brunhilde, our Dinosaurmother, which is trembling with fear and anxiety.

Why she is trembling with so much fear, you ask?

Well,  in just a short, distracted moment, a predator with a hungry love for eggs slipped through a small gap in the mountain she is living at and snatched all of her babys away.

Unfortunately for her, these are not strong enough yet, to break out of their shells and defend themselves, so she is in need to travel through her homeland and save her younglings.

NOW IT IS YOUR TIME !

It is the time for you, to help her and scramble the way through the mountains and grasslands, so the young dinosaurs can move on with their happy, and playful childhood (as soon as they fought against the challenge, breaking out of their eggs).

Ps.: Yes, you are correct - you can choose between two different variants of the graphics.

Now have fun and good luck!

some sounds were used from weloveindies.com as a student of the htk.academy
